highlights.description: Developed proxy and management servers for the electric vehicle Charging Statin Management System (CSMS)
Created a WebSocket proxy server to communicate with chargers and HTTP server using REST API for the management system. Uses Java, Vert.x, RxJava, Websocket, Gradle, PostgreSQL.

Analyzed, designed, developed, and tested in converting PHP data crawler into Java, handling 80,000+ data points per scheduled data scanning from 4 different data sources. Uses MariaDB, RESTful API, SOAP API, Vert.x
Communicated with Open Charge Alliance (OCA) on behalf of the company for membership, testing, and certification regarding OCPP 1.6 and 2.0.1
Developed features to production in 2 projects: Working Rules as a Platform (WRaaP) and CorrespondentLending as a Service (CLaaS)
Developed with Java, Spring Boot, AWS cloud distributed systems, CI/CD, Jenkins, Docker, Red Hat Openshift
Led, developed, troubleshoot, and conducted code reviews for 5 microservices using Flowable BPMN engine with a team of 3 for workflow automation
Discussed software architecture design patterns, such as single responsibility principles (SRP) and CQRS patterns
Researched and implemented 2 rules engines with a team of 5 within a month, incorporating 1075rules
Authored technical documents: flowcharts, Unified Modeling Language (UML) diagrams, how-to articles, technical playbook in Confluence for all 3 projects with over 15+ pages.
Developed frontend pages using TypeScript and Angular, leveraging rxjs library to ensure sequential asynchronous RESTful API calls, increasing response time from 1200 ms to 300 ms
Solved a complex problem that marries Okta authentication and LDAP to retrieve 20,000+ employee metadata
Wrote 50+ JUnit test cases for microservices, achieving 80% code coverage from 20%
Implemented a REST API that consumes a Kafka topic produced outside the application to process consumer data
Contributed to 3 PaaS projects within a bank from gathering requirements to providing solutions
Completed  over 70+ hours of training in industry best practices such as privacy by design, ethics in software, Java,Spring Boot, AWS, and Flowable
Collaborated with over 100+ IT professionals, closely working with 15 personnel for best results
